    Class
    Description
    Accounts
    Interface representing a collection of accounts in the Solana blockchain.

    Interface representing a collection of addresses obtained from a lookup table in the Solana blockchain.

    Interface representing an address lookup table in the Solana blockchain.
    AddressLookupTableEntrys
    Interface representing entrys for an address lookup table in the Solana blockchain.

    Interface representing an address lookup index in the Solana blockchain.
    AssociatedTokenAddress
    Interface representing an associated token address in the Solana blockchain.
    Blockhash
    Interface representing a blockhash in the Solana blockchain.
    ByteBufferSigner
    Interface representing an entity capable of signing transactions represented as ByteBuffer in the Solana blockchain.
    ByteBufferWriter
    Interface representing an entity capable of writing data to a ByteBuffer in the context of Solana blockchain references.
    Destination
    Interface representing a destination for a transaction in the Solana blockchain.
    InnerInstructionBuilder
    Interface for building inner instructions in a Solana blockchain transaction.
    InnerInstructions
    Interface representing inner instructions in a Solana blockchain transaction.
    InnerTransactionBuilder
    Interface for building inner transactions in a Solana blockchain transaction.
    InstructionBuilder
    Interface for building instructions in a Solana blockchain transaction.
    InstructionBuilderBase
    Base interface for building instructions in a Solana blockchain transaction.
    Message
    Interface representing a message in the Solana blockchain.
    MessageBuilder
    Interface for building messages in the Solana blockchain.
    MessageBuilderLegacy
    Interface for building legacy messages in the Solana blockchain.
    MessageBuilderV0
    Interface for building version 0 messages in the Solana blockchain.
    MessageVisitor<T>
    Interface representing a visitor for messages in the Solana blockchain.

    Interface representing an account lookup table view in the Solana blockchain.
    MessageVisitor.AccountsView
    Interface representing a view of accounts in the Solana blockchain.

    Interface representing an instruction view in the Solana blockchain.

    Interface representing a legacy message view in the Solana blockchain.

    Interface representing a view of a message in the Solana blockchain.
    MessageVisitor.Version0MessageView
    Interface representing a version 0 message view in the Solana blockchain.
    ProgramDerivedAddress
    Interface representing a program derived address in the Solana blockchain.
    PublicKey
    Interface representing a public key in the Solana blockchain.
    References
    Interface representing a collection of references to accounts in the Solana blockchain.
    SealedMessageBuilder
    Interface for building sealed messages in the Solana blockchain.
    SignedMessageBuilder
    Interface for building signed messages in the Solana blockchain.
    Slot
    Interface representing a slot in the Solana blockchain.
    TransactionBuilder
    Interface for building transactions in the Solana blockchain.
    TransactionInstruction
